archimate:Constraint.name: NFR010: solution's operationla layout (in any environment) need to be compliant with 3 layer network segregation policy
archimate:Constraint.documentation: Network is rigidly devided in 3 layers (Presentation, Application, Back end/DB). Each one separated from the other with firewall/balancers and in ANY case will exists VM or container that access two layers. The solution need to be compliant with that architecture.
